e: ￹`Ma~`ala~ `no~ `tao~ `ko~ `paliding~ `niyam~.￺Outsiders / strangers took our vehicle￻我們的車子被別人牽走了
￹`Tayra~ `cingra~ `i~ `taowanan~ `a~ `misa~`lama~.￺She went to visit some people.￻他到別人的家去玩，他去拜訪別人
￹`O~ `aolahen~ `ita~ `ko~ `tao~.￺We are to love our neighbors.￻我們應該愛我們的鄰居
d.f: ￹￺extended family members (south)￻延伸至涵蓋家庭的成員 (南部阿美語)
